intro: Helicteres aspera, commonly known as the rough helicteres, is a tropical shrub native to Central and South America. Helicteres aspera is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and riverbanks. It has been used in traditional medicine for its potential anti-inflammatory and antidiabetic properties.
